Software Engineer - Full Stack | San Francisco, CA | Volta Charging | ONSITE and WFH | voltacharging.com

We are a nationwide network of 500+ charging stations, and the only one to provide free charging to all electric vehicles. Our mission is to create the next generation infrastructure for domestic and global EV adoption. We just raised a $35M round of funding ($60M total to date), and have assembled a top notch leadership team comprised of veterans from a variety of industries and companies including Goldman Sachs, FOX Sports, GLAMSQUAD, Yahoo! Inc. and more.

Youâ€™ll work on a small close-knit team of 4 engineers. You will own services running in the cloud and on the web. These services will do everything from ingesting data to exposing it on a variety of interfaces like our internal web application and automated reporting mechanisms. Some role highlights include:

- Integrating with third-party hardware and software providers

- Warehousing and analyzing metrics collected from the network and third-parties

- Role-based authentication mechanism to enable private stations and protected access to metrics

- Web-based visualization layer for network-wide and station-specific metrics

- Our stack includes Javascript, Node, Postgres, and React

Apply at https://jobs.lever.co/voltacharging/1c081a88-c72c-4028-adcf-...
